We usually have sandwiches for breakfast.
Then who makes the sandwiches every day?
My mom makes many sandwiches for our family.
How many sandwiches does she make?
She makes ten sandwiches every day.
How much time does it take for her to make ten sandwiches?
It usually takes her more than an hour to make ten sandwiches.
Wow, it's a lot of work!
That's why my mom always gets up before 6.
